summary: This is a brief email correspondence from July 28, 2019, reporting that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was assessed by a psychologist and found to be psychologically stable, though he would remain on Psychological Observation and be reassessed the following day.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; an inmate who was assessed by a psychologist and found to be psychologically stable but remains on Psychological Observation.

events.title: Psychological Assessment of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein was assessed by a psychologist and determined to be psychologically stable, though he remained on Psychological Observation with another assessment scheduled for the next day.

keyFacts: On July 28, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was assessed by a psychologist while in custody.
The assessment concluded that Epstein was psychologically stable.
Despite the assessment, Epstein was to remain on Psychological Observation and be reassessed the following day.
